headline: Should You Rethink Parker-Hannifin After Strong Q2 Earnings and 20% 2024 Rally?
summary: If you are holding Parker-Hannifin in your portfolio, or thinking about getting in, you are definitely not alone. Investors have been paying close attention to this industrial powerhouse, and for good reason. The stock has quietly notched an impressive 28% total return over the past year and is up nearly 20% so far in 2024. Even when taking a broader view, Parker-Hannifin has more than doubled investors’ money in the last three years and nearly tripled it over five years. That is the kind of...
